00021 /**
00022  * @file   CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter.cpp
00023  * @author David Le
00024  * @date   Mon May 15 12:09:42 2006
00025  * 
00026  * @brief  Class for writing quantifications to a buffer before writing to CHP files.
00027  */
00028 
00029 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter.h"
00030 //
00031 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPFileUpdater.h"
00032 //
00033 
00034 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00035 
00036 CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter::CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter()
00037 {
00038         m_BufferSize = 0;
00039         m_MaxBufferSize = MAX_BUFFER_SIZE;
00040 }
00041 
00042 CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter::~CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter()
00043 {
00044         FlushBuffer();
00045         Cleanup();
00046 }
00047 
00048 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter::Cleanup()
00049 {
00050         for (int target=0; target<m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers.size(); target++) 
00051         { 
00052                 m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers[target].erase(m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers[target].begin(), m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers[target].end());
00053         }
00054         m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers.erase(m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers.begin(), m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers.end());
00055 }
00056 
00057 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter::Initialize(std::vector<std::string> *CHPFileNames)
00058 {
00059         m_CHPFileNames = CHPFileNames;
00060         Cleanup();
00061         for (int i=0; i<m_CHPFileNames->size(); i++)
00062         {
00063                 std::vector<std::pair<float, float> > quantificationBuffer;
00064                 m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers.push_back(quantificationBuffer);
00065                 m_TargetQuantificationDetectionRowIndexes.push_back(0);
00066         }
00067         m_BufferSize = 0;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter::WriteQuantificationDetectionEntry(int target, float quantification, float pvalue)
00071 {
00072         m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers[target].push_back(std::pair<float, float>(quantification, pvalue));
00073         m_BufferSize += sizeof(std::pair<float, float>);
00074         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00075         {
00076                 FlushBuffer();
00077         }
00078 }
00079 
00080 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter::FlushBuffer()
00081 {
00082         if(m_BufferSize > 0) {
00083                 for (int target=0; target<m_CHPFileNames->size(); target++)
00084                 {
00085                         CalvinCHPFileUpdater updater;
00086                         updater.OpenCHPFile((*m_CHPFileNames)[target].c_str());
00087                         updater.UpdateExpressionQuantificationDetectionBuffer(m_TargetQuantificationDetectionRowIndexes[target], m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers[target]);
00088                         updater.CloseCHPFile();
00089                         m_TargetQuantificationDetectionRowIndexes[target] += m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers[target].size();
00090                         m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers[target].clear();
00091                 }
00092         }
00093         m_BufferSize = 0;
00094 }
